question: Which Gothic-style church in Cēsis, Latvia, was consecrated in 1284?
asked_question_translated: Quale chiesa in stile gotico di Cēsis, in Lettonia, fu consacrata nel 1284?
answer: La chiesa gotica di San Giovanni (Svētā Jāņa baznīca) a Cēsis, in Lettonia, fu consacrata nel 1284.
answer_translated_eng: The Gothic Church of St. John (Svētā Jāņa baznīca) in Cēsis, Latvia, was consecrated in 1284.
